channel.title: Theme Options on Project Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Theme Options on Project Documentation

item.title: Breadcrumb Navigation
item.description: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>/ Guides / Theme Options / Breadcrumbs Enable Breadcrumbs linkBreadcrumb navigation is enabled by default1 and appears in the top right-hand corner of content pages above the page title. The Lotus Docs breadcrumb implementation functions with both multilingual and single-language sites. Structured Data linkThe breadcrumb navigation also auto-generates structured data for rich results to help enable search results that are more engaging to users. Here are the Breadcrumb Rich Results test results for this very page.

item.title: Link behaviour
item.description: Open external links in a new tab linkBy default, Lotus Docs will open external links in a new tab. This behaviour can be disabled by setting the extLinkNewTab parameter to false in your config: hugo.toml hugo.yaml hugo.json [params.docs] extLinkNewTab = false # Open external links in a new Tab? default true params: docs: extLinkNewTab: false # Open external links in a new Tab? default true { "params": { "feedback": { "extLinkNewTab": false } } } External links are indicated by the ’external link’ icon to the right of the link text.
